comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Adriana and I are going to try and tackle Flag today at 11:45. Anyone else that's interested can join outside HUMN (Norlin side).

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Sorry I missed the ride, mates. It looked like the perfect day, but an offer was made to buy my lunch and my legendary chintziness grabbed the reins and that was that. Lilac is nice, but so too is curry! DU
